衱字的基本解释

衱
jié
衣裾。
古同“袷”。
裙带：“珠压腰衱稳称身。”

衱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jié］
［《廣韻》其輒切，入葉，羣。］
［《廣韻》居怯切，入業，見。］
(1)衣后襟。
(2)古时交叠于胸前的衣领。

衱字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【衣字部】　衱； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1112第18
【唐韻】居怯切【集韻】訖業切，?音劫。【玉篇】裾也。【爾雅·釋器】衱謂之裾。【杜甫詩】背後何所見，珠壓腰衱穩稱身。　又【集韻】極曄切，音极。交領謂之衱。【廣韻】衣領也。【博雅】襋、衱謂之褗。

衱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
衱字的起名意思

暂无。

衱
Basic explanation of words
衱
jié
Attire.
The ancient same "jacket".
Skirt: "The bead presses down on the waist and fits the body firmly."
衱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jié］
["Guangyun" its round cut, enter the leaf, group. ]
["Guangyun" is timid, enters the industry, see you. ]
(1) The back of the clothes.
(2) The collar that overlapped on the chest in ancient times.
衱
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Jixia] [Department of Clothing Characters] 　衱; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 1112 and 18
[Tang Yun] Ju cowardly cut [Ji Yun] The industry cut, sound robbery. 【Jade articles】Yuan also. 【Erya·Release Device】The 衱 is called the 裾. [Du Fu Poetry] What do you see behind the back, the bead presses down on the waist and fits the body firmly.　[Jiyun] Extremely cut, sound extremely. Handed over that is the 衱. [Guang Yun] The collar is also. [Bo Ya] 褱, 衱 called 褗.
